Detailed Description

The RCS Manager is the new interface to use to interact with RCS plugin.

On validation : The class must search file to add and file to remove, and show a dialog to the user. After the validation of the dialog, the class must add, and remove files and commit the class.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum RCSManager::rcsAddRemoveOperation

Operations on file that XINX can made.

Enumerator:
RCS_ADD 

Add a file to RCS.

RCS_REMOVE 

Remove a file to the RCS.

QMap< QString, QString > RCSManager::revisionControlIds (  )  const

List all the revision control that can be used. The Result is a list of QPair. The first element is the key and the second element is the description.
